name: Aliens!!!
description:
Aliens!!! Introduction

You are a marine left in the middle of a city taken by aliens.

Your only choice to survive is to find enough fuel for the helicopter to escape.

Objectives
  • Find Gas for the Helicopter (You will find Gas in the containers)
  • Fill the Helicopter with Gas and leave the area
  • (Optional) Rescue the survivors found
  • (Optional) Kill the Aliens
Controls:
  • WASD: Move your character
  • Arrows: Shooting in each direction
  • Space: Shoot in looking direction
  • Mouse Click: Shoot in mouse direction
  • M: Switch On/Off the music
  • P: Pause
XBOX Controls:
  • Left Stick: Moving your character
  • A,B,X,Y: Shooting in each direction
Credits:
  • Thanks to Rainbirth for helping with the tileset
  • Thanks SFB Games for the ChipTone editor used for the sound fx
  • Thanks to BoscaCeoil.net for the music editor used for the main theme
  • This game was made using Unity and Super Tilemap Editor to create and edit the procedural dungeons.
